content: adorable squishy frankensteins monster is fun and fast to make this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level advanced beginner size finished dimensions of squish-ami is approximately 5 tall x 5 wide excluding the bolts at the sides of the head please note that this pattern is available for f ree on my blog here 1 the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern materials needed - super bulky weight #6 yarn exact brand and colors provided - crochet hook size us k 6 50 mm crochet hook - 15mm safety eyes embroider or crochet if for a young child - filberfill - stitch markers - yarn needle pattern is written in english using standard american terms this pattern originally appeared on crochet 365 knit too the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern please review the downloading tab and note that downloads work best from a computer the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-squish-ami/
